message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $9,500. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8,800 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $9,500 is a fair price considering the value this product offers. I'm willing to come down slightly to $9,200.
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $9,000 for the product.
